review: One of the few stays you will always want to return. Excellent rooms and facilities on a remote location. In addition to it Irshad and his family are great hosts. The homemade food they serve makes you lick your fingers. We were are group of 9adults and 1 kid booked this guest house this September 2019 for 1 night, but were so impressed that we returned to this place while returning from Zanskar. The best option to stay while going to Zanskar
name: kunalkadam
